channel.title: Project Fallout V2
channel.description:
[img]http://i26.tinypic.com/9blpvc.jpg[/img]
Disclaimer: i am not theowner of project fallout i am just the head master coder.
[size=12pt](Pictures coming soon!)[/size]
Black - not started Red - Unfinished yellow - almost done green - finished
[[[[Working on now]]]] Teleport everywhere (allows a person to upload a map such as the one in aq worlds and go to any non-member place in fallout) Tele to friend (idk why i added this, it does have a teleblock for certain areas) Car hijacking (i have been working on this for almost a year now and i still don't have a good formula for it) Construction (works like a charm ;)) New improved better animated npcs (almost two months from starting) New ranging equipment and better weapons Grand Exchange with working interface (tried it two times but it's still glitched) player control panel (for mods+ works kinda like vBulliten's forums member editor) Rogue's quest (you can earn full rogue ninja from this) Better inventory and chat sprites (moved around a bit)
I forgot some things but i will update you daily - mike -
UPDATE I: i just finished fixing the homepage, if you wanna check it out go to king-fallout.tk there is no server advertisement anywhere on the site just to make sure we don't break any rules. this site will provide you with contacting us and forums.
UPDATE II: I just had the owner add an anti-torrent full version software and game download section to the forums ;) pojectfallout.netau.net (i stole the rules part from moparscape and added it to the website xD.

item.title: Project Fallout V2
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

9blpvc.jpg898×223

Disclaimer: i am not theowner of project fallout i am just the head master coder.

[size=12pt](Pictures coming soon!)[/size]

Black - not started
Red - Unfinished
yellow - almost done
green - finished

[[[[Working on now]]]]
Teleport everywhere (allows a person to upload a map such as the one in aq worlds and go to any non-member place in fallout)
Tele to friend (idk why i added this, it does have a teleblock for certain areas)
Car hijacking (i have been working on this for almost a year now and i still don’t have a good formula for it)
Construction (works like a charm ;))
New improved better animated npcs (almost two months from starting)
New ranging equipment and better weapons
Grand Exchange with working interface (tried it two times but it’s still glitched)
player control panel (for mods+ works kinda like vBulliten’s forums member editor)
Rogue’s quest (you can earn full rogue ninja from this)
Better inventory and chat sprites (moved around a bit)

I forgot some things but i will update you daily - mike -

UPDATE I:
i just finished fixing the homepage, if you wanna check it out go to king-fallout.tk there is no server advertisement anywhere on the site just to make sure we don’t break any rules. this site will provide you with contacting us and forums.

UPDATE II:
I just had the owner add an anti-torrent full version software and game download section to the forums pojectfallout.netau.net (i stole the rules part from moparscape and added it to the website xD.
